dea.spamRescue
Class GeekToolsMSHI

java.lang.Object
  dea.spamRescue.HostInfo
      dea.spamRescue.GeekToolsHI
          dea.spamRescue.GeekToolsMSHI
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDebugLevels
public class GeekToolsMSHI
extends GeekToolsHI

Extends GeekToolsHI to use MS SQL server instead of HSQLDB.
Create for table is as follows: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[hostInfo] ( [hostName] [varchar] (255) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL , [abuseEmail] [varchar] (255) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [hostIP] [varchar] (16) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [nic] [varchar] (255) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [contact] [varchar] (255) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [status] [varchar] (255) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [lastChk] [datetime] NULL , [cnt] [int] NULL , [type] [varchar] (255) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL , [created] [datetime] NULL , [lastrec] [datetime] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
